Welcome to Vplants documentation

VPlants is set of packages to analyse, model and simulate plant architecture and its development at different scales (tissue, organ, axis and plant). These packages are developed by the Virtual Plants team. VPlants is the successor of the AMAPmod software.

This documentation is in progress and many aspects of Vplants are not covered yet. More documentation about the project and this package can be found on the OpenAlea Wiki

VPlants released packages

MTG

Multi graph
Target: users

PlantGL

Geometrical tools
Target: users

StatTool

Statistical tools
Target: users

Fractalysis

Fractalysis tool
Target: users

Tissue

Simulation tools on plant tissues
Target: modelers, users

Sequence Analysis

statistical tools on sequence (markov,...)
Target: users

Tool

C++ library used by stat_tool and sequence_analysis
Target:users, developers

Tree statistic

statistical tools dedicated to trees
Target:users, developers

LPy

Python version of Lindenmayer Systems.
Target: users

Container

container
Target: users

WeberPenn

WeberPenn
Target: users

Mechanics

Mechanics
Target: users

VTissue

Vtissue
Target: users

MappleT/stocatree

Vtissue
Target: users
